generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a crosswalk, which is clearly designated for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: There is a paved sidewalk on the right side of the road, separated by a curb, and also a pedestrian crossing area on the left side.
- building: A multi-story residential building is visible in the background on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are present along the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and some soil are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, showing green lights.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign indicating a right turn is visible on the left side of the road.
- car: A dark-colored SUV is visible crossing the intersection on the left side of the road.
- pole: Traffic light poles are visible on both sides of the road.
- fence: A hedge fence is visible on the right side of the road.
